type.dldescription: Modelled with a â€• NaturalHazardClassification data type

validFrom.dldescription: ISO8601 date format 2018-07-19T23:00:08+00:00. Indicates start date for period of validity

validTo.dldescription: ISO8601 date format 2018-07-19T23:00:08+00:00. Indicates end date for period of validity

assessmentMethod.dldescription: Describes method used to express the likelihood of a hazard event

qualitativeLikelihood.dldescription: Describes in narrative form the assessment of the likelihood of occurrence of a hazard event

quantitativeLikelihood.dldescription: Probability of occurrence, or a return period

returnPeriod.dldescription: long-term average interval of time or number of years within which an event will be equaled or exceeded

probabilityOfOccurrence.dldescription: The probability of occurrence is the inverse value of the return period

levelOrIntensity.dldescription: A magnitude, or intensity, can be expressed either qualitatively, or quantitatively
